Review Text: We had a pretty nice stay at the Prama Hotel overall. Breakfast was okay and a good way to start the day. The pools were a real highlight ‚Äî plenty of space, comfy chairs, and a great spot to relax. The staff were friendly and welcoming, which made the stay feel pleasant. There were a few small downsides. The WiFi was quite slow and kept dropping out, which could be frustrating at times. The beds were a little uncomfortable, and there wasn‚Äôt any conditioner provided. We also had some trouble with the TV connecting to the right network, and when it disconnected it was hard to reconnect. The shower didn‚Äôt have much space to put toiletries either. Even with these issues, we still enjoyed parts of our stay, especially the pool area, and with a few improvements it could be even better.

When we come in room pillows were not ready and so I worn them for this. Next day they had brought to our room a fruit plate and written a apologize not. Thanks them for this politeness. Hotel was just bekar the ses and view and breakfast was wonderful. Personel were good working and polite. I was top glad to stay at this hotel. I advise to everybody...

We were in Prama in November 2025. Reception is opened 24h. We arrived at 2am in the night and service was excellent. Room 245 was big - equipped with fridge, smart TV (include Netflix and Youtube apps), electric kettle (coffee, tea and two bottle of water daily replenished), safe box (enough for 14'' laptop), big, comfortable bed. Terrace has two chairs and table. Bathroom is nice, average size with good quality cosmetics. WiFi is available in rooms and all hotel areas - speed enough for Netflix/Youtube. Staff are helpful and professional - after check out you can stay at hotel and use infrastructure (swimming pool, beach etc) and take shower before journey in gym (till 7pm). Breakfast is very good - the choice is large (fruits, egg zone, dishes from Indonesia and Western - fantastic bacon:D) available till 10.30 am. Two swimming pools (one small for babies and parents, second big (with two depths - 1.5m and 1.8m) - good to swimming. Bar avaialble from swimming pool. Width hotel beach with sunbeds, umbrellas and tables. Hotel garden is very big and green with indonesian culture motivies - very climatic:) Bicycle rental available on hotel (50 IDR for two hours, 75 IDR for all day). Nearby the hotel you can find few shops (with clothes and with food) and lots of restaurant (nice place is Linga Longa where you can eat, drink and hear rock/metal live music (start at 8.30pm) in super climatic place. Price in restaurants and bars are high (for Indonesian realitics) - I think should be cheaper (hint - 50m away of hotel beach zone is restaurant where you can buy drinks for a half price and take it away:)):) Bicycles could be better quality (if you rent - check them preciosly before drive outside of the hotel) Besides of this two small things the rest was fantastic and we highly recommend this hotel

This is my go to place for Sanur. The reception staff are outstanding and let me checkin slightly early to allow me to prepare for a ln event with the new Irish Ambassador. Kadek was great helping me with all my luggage. The service and quality in all the restaurants is consistently good quality each time. The breakfast options are so good also, lots of choice, and fresh , hot. Thank you team once again for another great stay .

A very nice, large hotel, with a reasonable price, reflecting its quality and service. It's located in Sanur, as the name suggests. Before entering the hotel, you'll pass restaurants and shops on either side of the road, offering a variety of Balinese souvenirs and other necessities. The rooms are clean, smoke-free, and comfortable, with electricity, power outlets, and USB ports for charging gadgets. The conference room is on the ground floor, overlooking the beach. Likewise, the restaurant is on the ground floor, overlooking the beach and pool to either side.

I had an extremely upsetting and unacceptable experience with Prama Sanur regarding accessibility for a quadriplegic guest in our group. Before booking, the hotel explicitly confirmed they were wheelchair accessible and even told us which room type to book for a wheelchair user. We booked the hotel based entirely on this assurance. Our guest is 31 years old, quadriplegic, cannot walk, cannot talk, and requires a shower/commode chair and full-time care. We explained all of this clearly, multiple times. Despite this, the hotel later suggested that his shower chair should ‚Äúremain outside the bathroom,‚Äù which is impossible for someone who cannot walk or stand? They also stated the bathroom doorway is 80 cm wide but then claimed his 60 cm shower chair could not fit, a direct contradiction that they could not explain. Even worse, after confirming accessibility before we booked, the hotel then tried to charge us an additional around $500 AUD for a different room that actually met basic accessibility needs. Treating accessibility as a paid ‚Äúupgrade‚Äù is discriminatory and completely unacceptable. Especially after advising us to book a different room prior to this Throughout weeks of emails, we received confusing, contradictory, and unhelpful responses. They repeatedly avoided our questions and eventually left us with no option other than to cancel because the hotel could not safely accommodate a disabled guest, despite their promises before booking. No wheelchair user should ever be told to leave their shower chair outside the bathroom or forced to pay extra just to access the toilet and shower safely. The way this situation was handled was unprofessional, misleading, and inhumane. I strongly advise anyone travelling with accessibility needs to avoid this property until the staff are properly trained and the hotel stops falsely advertising accessibility as something they provide. Disabled guests deserve dignity, safety, and honest information - none of which we received here.

Hotel is indeed very beautiful, beach and restaurant facilities are beautiful! Staff are friendly and accommodating, rooms are clean, but don‚Äôt forget to put your do not disturb sign on the door if you want a sleep in. Great selection for breakfast and pools for all ages. It‚Äôs a very populated hotel, a lot of people stay here however all the facilities seemed to accommodate everyone fairly comfortably which was great! Only thing I can possibly fault is that our room was smaller than most other beach resorts we have stayed at and bathroom was hard to move in, perhaps if we upgraded to a bigger room our stay would have been that little bit more comfortable. All in all though we enjoyed our stay and it‚Äôs 5 stars from us.

Sama sekali jauh dari standard bintang 5 karena fasilitas hotel sangat minim. Yang 5 stars hanya lokasinya yang dekat dengan pantai (beachfront) dan harga makanan+minuman di restaurant hotel yang lebih mahal dibanding restaurant dengan standard yang sama di sekitar pantai sanur. Hotel dengan bangunan lama, furniture sudah banyak yang usang dan rusak serta perlu perbaikan. Taman area hotel lumayan indah dan terawat dengan baik. Sayangnya kondisi area publik dengan kamar sangat jauh berbeda dan buruk, terutama area kamar mandi. Selama menginap lebih dari 7 hari, saluran air selalu mampet dan menyebabkan air menggenang di lantai kamar mandi. Harus menunggu lama sampai air bisa surut. Benar-benar pengalaman yang tidak menyenangkan. Bidet juga tidak berfungsi dengan baik, air sangat minim. Staff hotel cukup ramah dan helpful, terutama staff wanita yang melayani breakfast. Mereka selalu menyambut dan membantu tamu dengan senyuman hangat meskipun suasana sangat crowded dan banyak permintaan dari tamu. Menu breakfast kurang variatif dan cukup membosankan karena cenderung menyajikan menu yang hampir sama setiap hari. Area swimming pool sangat luas, dan sangat nyaman karena terpisah lokasi pool untuk anak-anak dan dewasa. Untuk kolam renang anak dilengkapi beberapa permainan interaktif diantaranya adalah big water bucket.
Very old hotel, that probably was top one 30-40 years ago but now needs urgent renovation works. Helpfully the staff is nice and serviceable. You can find much much better here.

We have a very pleasant stay at the Prama Sanur Beach hotel. The hotel is well maintained despite the age of the hotel. The room is clean and well presented. Staff are very courteous and accommodating. We like to give special shout out to Ibu Umanik, we think she is the manager in charge of all the restaurants and cafes. Her customer service, attention to details and memory of customers names and needs is impeccable. She will go above and beyond to assist you. I hope someone in management will recognize her capabilities. She deserves a promotion for sure.

On had a 2 day stop over but everything was great! My only mention would be that the baked beans on the breakfast buffet were not cooked before being put into the heated basins. (Touch of butter and some S&P works miracles) Besides that the rooms were clean and the staff were very friendly.

This place is well overdue for a facelift. Lots of things are in disrepair. Rooms not ready to checkin at the check in time. Decor is extremely aged. Bathrooms not cleaned properly. Our booking was completely stuffed up and had to have a single bed crammed into our tiny room to make up for their booking error. Happy hour differs between different bars of the same hotel. The list could go on forever. Just a big collection of things that could be done a lot better with more oversight. The place is simply very tired.

The location of this hotel is wonderful. The beach front walk is beautiful, peaceful and has lots of cafes and restaurants to choose from. The rooms are comfortable, could use some more lighting as it‚Äôs quite dark inside. Beautiful breakfast and affordable pool side drinks, snacks and room service. Highly recommended for families.
Rasa dan menu jenis makanan/minuman harus diperbaiki. Pantai banyak kotoran (maaf) anjing. Overall bagus.

It‚Äôs a five hotel but the furniture inside are old (for example there were holes near the lamp at the wall and there was rust around the mirror in the bathroom) and the basic stuff that, off course in my opinion, they have to be available for a such kind of resort are not adequate: only the bigger towels for everything. However, the welcome service was great, they took our luggage and gave us a free drink to wait before our room was ready. They also organised on the beach interesting event (tradition Bali dance where we can took an amazing photos with the dancers) and you can also enjoy fresh pizza cooked in wood hover! Do not forget to mention also the BBQ, even the portion we‚Äôre not so generous but the beef was of excellent quality. In conclusion, I recommend this hotel for families: breakfast was excellent, there are two big swimming pools, spa where you can enjoy excellent massage (price little higher than outside in Bali but it worth!), there are games for children.
A good 3.5 to 4 star standard. Is an old resort but that's reflected in the pricing. Good facilities, friendly staff. Enjoyed the bamboo bar with live music on the beach every night

We did not stay at this location but did join for an evening with dinner, entertainment, cultural dance and fireworks as an added bonus. Very family friendly where you can meet your new next best friend watching the tide come in.

Beautiful grounds, location was perfect, breakfast was outstanding, the Indonesian night was great. Staff are lovely! All the food and drinks we ordered were excellent, not once was disappointed with quality - thank you to the chefs! The rooms are old and need some love, room 418 has mould on the ceiling, stains on the curtains and lamp shades, broken panel in the wardrobe, easy fixes but not being done. The kids pool area is great but is a bit sketchy, the double slide is a strange angle so you come down smashing your bum at the bottom. The metal safety rails are rusty and feel like they could break, a child would die falling from that height onto the concrete or tile surface below. It felt a bit unsafe overall and needs safety attention overall. The pools in general were lovely if you can get a seat, staff need to stop people claiming chairs before breakfast and then not sitting there until afternoon. One of the guys (older, chubbier) at pool towel desk is very rude and makes you feel like you are inconveniencing his mobile phone scrolling time. There‚Äôs no real vibe here, no music, no one drinks at the pool bar. Constantly searching for a staff member by the pool, not many around to order food or drinks. I emailed multiple times to ensure the rollaway bed was added and they confirmed, despite this we arrived after midnight with little kids to still find this not done so we then had to wait around for it. I‚Äôve read similar reviews. The attention to details needs to be better. We will return probably one day but would love to see an improvement to the rooms and kids pool area safety. They are still charging a lot so the money is there to fix things.

Lowkey had high expectations for this hotel however it was just a normal stay in my experience. There is more families or older couples here to have a chill time so if you are coming here to party this would not be the hotel to stay at. The location is right on the beach so it is really convenient to go from hotel room to the beach. The staff here are kind and very helpful aswell. The free breakfast is a buffet style with so many different choices, it was also very good and some foods change daily.
Sari is the best. She and the staff of the hotel always take good care of my grandparents and make sure they have a lovely time. Great pool and right next to the beach.
Hotel ini sangat nyaman park luas, pelayanan humanis, walaupun lokasinya jauh masuk ke dalam,tapi dekat dengan pantai, hotel ini berada di tepi pantai, pokonya mantap.

I am a big fan of Prama. I have had the pleasure of visiting prama since I was a wee boy. They have adapted fantasticly throughout the times. Great upkeep, great local hospitality and a wonderful rest and relax destination for families!!

Hotel dengan salah satu pantai yang bagus untuk sunrise, banyak arena bermain anak juga, pantainya bersih dan landai, bayak ketemu bintang ular sejenis bintang laut dan kelomang kecil masih banyak di pantainya

Bought a day-pass to spend at the pool and splash pads with my wife and 3 y/o daughter. At a cost of 125k rupiah each w/ towel, water bottle and 10% off F&B, plus use of a covered bodega poolside, it was a superb day of play and relaxation. Also the restaurant food and drinks were top quality. Thank you!

The hotel is actually nice with a classic touch, but it feels old and really needs some renovation. I got a room upgrade from a male FO staff, which was nice I appreciate it. However, during check-in at 2 PM, my room wasn‚Äôt ready. The other FO didn‚Äôt update me for almost an hour until I went back to the desk myself turns out the room was ready. She also didn‚Äôt inform me about my room floor this hotel is huge or the WiFi password, so I had to figure it out on my own. The room is spacious and classic, but a few things need improvement: the bidet holes were blocked so the spray was painful to use (I even had to clean it myself to make it smoother with toothpick), wooden furniture and doors are noisy, and some areas show mold (like near the socket). The makeup mirror should be placed better, not directly facing the bed. Breakfast has variety but the taste is average, though the pastries are good. On the positive side, staff in general are friendly and polite but need to improves and serve better

The rooms are dated, the check-in experience was not ideal as the room wasn't ready until around an hour after it should have been. Ordered hot food a couple of times that wasn't hot. Had one cold meal taken away to fix, came back cold. People travelling with us had constant trouble with their room, from aircon not working to ants in the beds, dirty bed linen, etc. Staff always seemed to either have no idea how to fix things, or didn't care. The beachfront location is great though, with heaps of restaurants and live music venues around.
Pertama kali masuk ke area Hotel Prama Sanur Beach Bali, dalam kegiatan wisuda ke 29 STKIP Agama Hindu Amlapura, tempatnya bagus, luas dan nyaman. Smoga lain kali bisa kesini lagi
Thank you for an amazing stay! Your staff, facilities, and service were all outstanding. We couldn‚Äôt be happier ‚Äî highly recommend and can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Layanannya oke banget stafnya helpful semua Mau pulang, hape eror, trus ditolongin petugas Concierge nama nya Bli Pram diorderin taksi online ke bandara pake aplikasi pribadinya dy Makasih bli

Staff are fabulous, clean rooms, amenities good. Biggest complaint was that other guests would save multiple pool chairs from 6:30am despite the staff saying that if the seats weren't used within an hour, the towels would be removed. NEVER happened. Staff actually assisted this one woman to put multiple chairs together & spread out inflatable toys on the seats to save every morning!! They remained saved for several hours until her family arrived!! Very frustrating as could rarely get seats by the pool. Won't be staying here again if l can't get near the pool!!!
Ballroom cukup lega dan sangat dingin. Suasana tidak membosankan karena ada private beach untuk view yg keren

Not the best experience so far. I arrived at the hotel around 3-3.30 PM, which was 1.5 hours after the supposedly check in hour, but i arrived and found out that the room wasn‚Äôt ready. Because check out as per my understanding is supposed to be around 11 AM - 12 PM. So I didn‚Äôt understand how come with 3.5 hours gap, the room was still not ready. And after entering the room, I found out that the room was very old and most of the furnitures have some chips on some parts, I mean as a 5 stars hotel, it just doesnt make sense. And the toilet was really smelly when i entered. Not to mention the lift wasn‚Äôt working.

Our group (two couples and three kids between us) stayed for a week in mid-August 2025. The resort presents well for its age. Everything is very clean, the grounds well kept and staff friendly (everyone saying hello etc.). Some of the common areas definitely need a refresh. We had a room on the fourth floor of the northern side of the resort, facing the beach/big pool. The room was clean, but somewhat dated and in need of maintenance. We saw some rooms being renovated during our stay, so they're working on that. There's lifts to access the upper levels, but the stairs were more convenient for pool/beach access. The kids loved going to kids club each day. The staff (particularly Elis and Santi) were friendly, caring and attentive. The kids club staff break for an hour for lunch at about 12 (fair enough!), so you do have to pick up the kids for that. Some of the service staff by the pool were on rollerblades (with varying degrees of ability!). At times, service by the pool could be hard to come by. This could be improved with the 'flag and menu' system seen elsewhere (i.e., leave menus permanently at the seats, with guests raising their flag for service). Bike hire from the resort was reasonably priced and the bikes good to ride. We used the resort bikes to get up to the Icon Mall (about a 3km ride north along the beach), where you can park securely and have a wander around. Pay attention to the bike lanes and keep left! The nightly beach activities/entertainment were great (the kids really enjoyed this). There's a 'Bali swing' on the beach for photos/the kids to play on. The breakfast buffet was good. Plenty to choose from and a good fresh egg station. Espresso coffee and a 'crispy bacon' option would not go astray!! The 'Pepito Market' was our go to for supplies (about 300 m east of the main gate). Sanda Spa for massages (just east of the main gate). Jungle Tree restaurant (just across the road from the main gate) was great for dinners with the kids too. Massimo (Italian restaurant) was fabulous for pizza and ice cream. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay at the resort and we will definitely be back.
kamarnya tua, bau lembab ruangnnya, bedebu, kecil, handuk maupun handuk kaki jg kotor bernoda. jau dari mana2. dengan harga segitu bisa cari tempat lain

It is a nice hotel with very good food and facilities. But I would say it is a bit basic by Sanur standards. It was built in the late 70's and is really showing its age with the basic design and water damage marks everywhere. It is perfectly clean and well maintained with beautiful grounds, it's just not as modern as other hotels next door and down the beach. I would definitely say it is more of a four star hotel than five (which they market it as).

Wonderful stay ‚Äì beautiful resort and amazing staff! I had a fantastic experience at Prama Sanur Beach Bali. The staff were absolutely amazing ‚Äì so warm, welcoming, and helpful throughout the stay. The resort itself is very clean and well-maintained, with beautiful gardens that create a peaceful atmosphere. I especially loved the beachfront location. The pool was great, and the little kids club is super cute and a nice touch for families. Room service was prompt and the food was good. The hotel is also in a great location, just a short walk to shops and restaurants in Sanur. Overall, a lovely place to stay ‚Äì we will definitely come back!

Best thing about this place is the location.. right on the beach . However the room was well below par ! It had not been cleaned , outside our small balcony was littered with cigar butts yuck , the air-conditioning vents were black and dusty ..I would not recommend for health reasons . Such a shame as i have stayed here previously and it was good .

THIS IS NOT A 5 STAR RESORT. There's nothing about this hotel that is 5 star. It needs a desperate refurbishment. We've stayed in 5 star resorts all over the world and this is the worst hotel we've ever stayed in. Paint flaking off the walls, mould in the bathroom, filthy walls in bedroom, rusty nails, dusty, mouldy net curtains, under the bed is filthy - We've got 2 rooms 302 and 306 they are awful. We are a family of 4 so had to have 2 rooms which doubles the cost for us. Most hotels have family rooms that we can all fit in. The kids waterside are rusty, tiles in Kids pool need replacing, several of the other kids pool things dont work or are just very run down. Breakfast- average selection. Nothing special but not terrible. They dont show you to a table so you have to wonder around trying to find an empty one. Lunches are average. Coffee and teas in the bedroom are never topped up. People have been walking in off the street taking sunbeds without paying when they dont even stay here. Staff are friendly and the location is pretty good. Thats about it in terms of how good it is. Still staying here until Saturday but can't wait to leave. Avoid at all costs!

I wouldn't recommend this place unless some serious overhauls happen in terms of facilities and staff. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived and an hour later when it was done our sheets were dirty. House keeping rarely changed things that needed changing like glasses, mugs and toilet paper. Our aircon controls didnt work and was stuck on the lowest setting making it unbearably cold, and when maintenance came by they just moved the vents to face to opposite wall instead of fixing the main issue. The pool is a warzone of people fighting over deck chairs one family even going so far as to pay staff to put pool toys out on 7 deck chairs before the pool opened. The only thing this place has going for it is the location as it has great access to the beach and some great music venues although a short walk along the beach will leave you feeling depressed seeing all of the other hotels that outshine the prama.

Overall poor value for money plus tip! Rooms are same price as Australia but you get so much more in Australia, including water you can drink or put in the kettle, with milk & complimentary biscuits. The air conditioning is stuck on freezing, the room stank of mildew so they shoved a perfume air block thing in the ac vent - I am now finding mildew/ mould on the bathroom doors so they're sending someone to clean that up. There's no instructions for wifi, no map for finding your way around the resort. Tired & down for dinner & no complimentary water with meal - yes- you're paying for that too- if yr foreign, yr a walking $ sign. Ordered sate on sate night - 6 sticks with a tablespoon of cold, lumpy, peanut sauce- asked for more, and the 2nd lot was hot, lumpless & a more generous serve - prices with tax & service make it - similar to Aus and again, Aus quality is so much better including simple things like a glass of water. Travelling solo but room price includes 2 breakfast & I cant be credited for the 2nd breakfast or exchange it for a coffee! Definitely, not my accommodation or destination of choice - when you factor in the airfare and time travelling, a Australian beachside holiday is as cheap or cheaper, better value & better quality üòâ But wait....there's more - this is the remote control - just a great big chunk of old mould!!! I just dont get it...its hard to believe the 5/5 reviews are legit- just sayin..I have photos but cant post Staff a gorgeous, of course, not their fault - I'm paying the dollars, they're not earning the dollars -someone in the middle's ripping us both off!

Bought pool day pass for Rp. 125k. Had a great time with kids. Adult pool, kids pool and baby pool.. enough sunbeds for everyone. Visited in September, there were construction noises on the background.
This hotel has great facilities for any type of family. The rooms are starting to show their age and are on the small size however, the activities and location are the reason to stay there.

- This hotel is not a 5 star one. It very outdated and the rooms are worn out. - Cleanness also is a matter at the communal areas! - The pool is full and the benches are not enough for all tenants. - The food at the restaurant is also average. We tried the clue sandwich and the pizza were poor. - Breakfast is good but still only black coffee as an option and we had to ask 3 times.

Spectacular location and beautiful facilities! Two gigantic pools, one specifically for children. Three restaurants, beach bar, direct beach access. Can‚Äôt beat this location! The spacious grounds & gardens are beautifully maintained. Rooms are very nice, but slightly dated. We had a ground floor room with balcony overlooking pool and beach, and it was great! Breakfast at beach restaurant terrific with many options.

Hotel ini memang unggul di lokasi dan fasilitas yg kumplit,, cuma pelayanannya kurang ramah. Sambil nunggu kamarnya ready, sy diberi voucher welcome drink, kata receptionya bisa ditukar cafe dekat pantai. Sy menuju kesana, pas sampe cafenya, dipingpong sm petugasnya. Serasa mereka males ngurusin hal kyk beginian, karna mereka lg sibuk ngurusin pesanan bulebule (fyi, disana banyak wisatawan asing) Seharusnya cukup ambil vouchernya dan bilang utk sy menunggu. Lalu sambil menunggu sy duduk dimeja pinggir pantai. Tidak lama datang 1 gelas kecil minuman, pdhl ada sy sm suami dan anak. Lalu sy tanya.. (dgn sopan nanyanya) ‚Äú ka 1 voucher berapa gelas?‚Äù Dia menjawab dgn malas2an ‚Äú 2 bu , nanti sy ambil 1 lagi ‚Äú Heloo kenapa gak sekalian aja tdi‚Ä¶ Petugas di pool juga gak ramah. Reception juga gak ramah. Yg jaga pintu dan security lobby juga gak helpfull. Dy gak mencoba bantu waktu kita kesulitan masukin koper ke mobil. Posisi lobby depannya tangga. Saat sy kesana jg Ada bule yg bawa koper kabin sampai jatuh ditangga karna ribet bawa koper dan sblmnya gak dibantuin. Baru pas jatuh dibantuin. Yg lumayan ramah ibu2 yg jaga di depan saat breakfast. Dy juga nyapa tamu2. Berkah utk hidupmu bu, karna memperlakukan org lain dgn baik. Dan helpfull. Kondisi kamar luasnya cukup, tapi ya itu karna hotel lama furniture dan ambiencenya hotel lama. Stayed here for a week in September 2024 and had a great time. Right on the beach, big pool, beach bar, great food and helpful staff.
Lovely beachside hotel with a relaxing atmosphere. The view of the ocean is beautiful, and it‚Äôs very easy to walk to the beach. Rooms are clean and comfortable, and the staff are helpful

We loved the pool and restaurants, unfortunately the room was not so nice. Had previous occupants receipts/dirt under bed within eye distance, bins not cleaned over, shower & bathroom had a lot of mould, easy to rub off. Ceiling (painted over) and ac vents had mold, tho was cool. Balcony was needing a refurbished as balcony steel work was eroding. Restaurants and pool/gardens beautiful.

This property is older style ones in Sanur Area. Its rated 5 stars but I think 3 stars Max due to physical property conditions. The service is excellent however We did not have a good rest here due to the fact that the AIRCOND is not able to cool down the room. We asked for a technician who came and tried to fix it. We ended up upgraded to club room which the air cond also unable to cool down the room. Tired to change room again, we decided to stay. The pool area is old and need a makeover. Breakfast is little bit chaotic. Location is beach direct. Will choose somewhere else in the future as We need a good rest during our holiday.
Mantap, cm lantai agak licin krn kayu vernish. Polesnya licin, td sempat mau ke-pleset. Kamar ok, kebersihan jg, AC kurang dingin, perlu dibservis.
Room wasn't according to expectations. Bad cleaning and bad AC. We changed rooms and it was a little better. Rest of hotel was very good. Beach was ok, a little dirty.

My recent stay at this five-star hotel, during an international research conference, was significantly disappointing due to several issues. Facility Condition The hotel appears old and lacks basic maintenance. I observed a leak in a hallway. In the room, the hairdryer didn't work, the bathroom power socket was dead, and all other power sockets were loose. The security lock was broken, and the fridge was excessively loud. Staff and Conference Organization Staff generally lacked pleasantness and smiles, suggesting a need for improved guest interaction training. During the conference, directional signs were unclear and remained up even after the event concluded, pointing to a lack of efficient management and clear responsibilities. Strongly recommend avoiding this hotel.
Staffnya ngga helpfull, minta tolong dianter pake payung krn ujan deras ke mobil malah ngga dibantu.

Loves the ambience, affordable price for 5-star hotel. Fast response, when our toilet got some problem. The room furniture was out of date, and I found some of dusk :( But the most like is direct access to the beach. Fyi we stayed here on 2024 ‚Ä¶ about last year ago, well how time flies so fast.
Air di kamar mandi sering tergenang ,toiletries tdk diisi dan tdk lengkap ,utk hotel sekelas bintang 5 pelayanan sgt kurang

Extend 1 hari dengan turun grade kamar, malah dikasih kamar yang sama. Thanx banget, kami sangat menikmati 1 day extend kami di Prama Sanur Beach Hotel. Kamar bersih, kolam renang nyaman buat anak2 dan dewasa, breakfast lengkap. Saran sedikit saja, sarung bantal dan sprei mungkin bisa dibuat lebih bersih dan wangi lagi, karena terkesan baunya kurang sedap. Overall 9/10

It's a decent resort to stay at however its very basic. The bathroom has mould and hasn't been cleaned properly in a long time (stains on glass, shower head etc). The buffet breakfast is decent, however the restaurants on the resort (for lunch or dinner) serve below average food and drinks. I was coming for business agenda in Bali. It was so amazing stay. I like their spacious classic room, garden, and the private beach. I was lucky getting the Kecak dance performance at their Bamboo Restaurant. The must eat dish gor me is urap. I do like it! I got so nice direct sunrise and also beautiful indirect sunset. Sitting and enjoying the beach really released out the stress!! Hoping to get there again with my family!

Great hotel for the price. Good sized pool areas, decent breakfast, friendly staff, brilliant location, large rooms and lots to do and eat/drink in the area. After a couple of weeks staying in different parts of Bali it was great to have the beachside walkway to stroll along. It's hard to walk in most spots on the island and having this, and all the great bars and restaurants along the way, made a big difference. The ocean breeze is also great on a hot day. It's not really a 5 star hotel though. If you want luxury there are other options in the area but they will cost x5 more. I'd say this is more realistically a solid 4 star experience. The only downside for me is that it's almost impossible to find a lounger by the main pool during the day. But there was plenty of space on the beach.

We just arrived from Novotel, Lombok where everything was exceptional from decor to service. At Prama Sanur we booked the depressing Superior Suite: it provides the basics in an unloved small space. Chipped paint, old and lumpy mattress and clean but overused bedding- for the first time in my traveling life I looked for bed bugs, I was that uncertain; warm, not hot, water; functional but more depressive than impressive environment. Never again given the options in Bali.

Staffnya ramah, cepat dan sangat membantu. Kids friendly. Makanannya enak. Anak aku suka nginep disana. Agak menyesal tidak milih stay diprama aja sepanjang liburan di bali. Next trip akan kembali lagi

Hotelnya, ada dua bagian sepertinya, sisi lama dan sisi baru. Waktu itu, saya stay di sisi yang lama. Meski lama, namun tetap nyaman, wifi kencang, sarapan enak. Peralatan gym juga masih bagus.

I have to say that we enjoyed our stay at Prama Sanur but definitely not 5 star. Room wasn't clean, aircon sounded like a B52 but on a positive note breakfast was good, location great but the rooms need refurbishing.

saya sangat suka sekali prama hotel karena menawarkan pengalaman menginap istimewa dengan lokasi strategis di Sanur, akses mudah ke pantai, dan fasilitas lengkap seperti kolam renang, spa, serta restoran. Staf ramah, pemandangan tidak diragukan lagi indahnya. Makanan untuk bintang 5 agak kurang variatif ya.. Pengalaman paling berkesan adalah ketika pulang ke kamar diatas jam 11 malam dan kebetulan sendiri, agak merinding lewat toko toko souvenir dan ruangan yg bernama melati dengan wangi melati dan dupa .. bbrr.. balik lagi minta dianter ke petugas yg di loby.. We were there 2024 excellent location and service Employees very attentive Excellent breakfast

We are about to leave Prama after a 10 night stay. Our first impression was that our room felt a little tired, but keeping an open mind, we didn‚Äôt make any judgement on the rest. The overall feel of the hotel is of calm and peace. The staff are incredible. Everyone smiles and says hello. Breakfast has absolutely everything you would want and more. If we ever come to Sanur again, we shall come back here because the value is fantastic. We recommend you stay here too üòÉ

Fasilitas yang ditawarkan oleh hotel ini sangat lengkap, mulai dari kolam renang besar yang dikelilingi oleh taman tropis, pusat kebugaran, hingga spa yang menyediakan berbagai perawatan relaksasi. kesini udah 2x, sempet ambil racepack utk event lari sama mampir bimbingann karna dosen ada workshop disana, sejuk, pelayanan baik, ramahhh

very pleasant. the hotel is a bit old, but the facilities are amazingly good. there is a private beach, the beach is quiet, clean, and can swim. rather than going to the crowded and dirty Sanur beach, it's better to stay here and still be able to play on the beach and see the sunrise. this hotel has a nice beach bar to relax. this hotel is very family friendly, it has 2 swimming pools, 2 children's swimming pools and 1 adult pool. the design of the statues in the hotel is really cool. the hotel staff is very friendly and ready to help. very satisfied in this hotel. if I go to Bali again, I will definitely stay here

Hotel ini menawarkan kamar dengan fasilitas seperti TV layar datar, minibar, dan penyejuk udara, serta akses internet Wi-Fi gratis. Fasilitas lainnya termasuk kolam renang, sarapan, dan layanan kamar. Hotel ini juga dekat dengan beberapa tempat wisata populer di Sanur, seperti Prasasti Blanjong dan Pura Dalem Pengembak.

Great location on the beach, lovely pools, one is adult only, plenty of seating on the beach and by the pool. Lovely food, great breakfast. The rooms are big. Beds are comfy. Staff are very friendly. We have had a great time x

A larger, older hotel in Sanur in a fantastic location(walk out right onto the beach, which is clean, calm and perfect for swimming / families with kids). The service is phenomenal, simply wonderful staff. Close to all amenities. I really enjoyed my stay!

Our 3rd stay and still one of the best stay here in Bali. Kids remember when they first and second times visit with good memories. Great service from the staffs, good facilities with activities and entertainment. Thank you Prama for great memories.

A wonderful stay,! Although it‚Äôs a big place with lots of people, we felt very well attended to all the time! Staff are very aware and always watching ready to offer assistance at all times. Meals were delicious and good value.

Me and my wife stayed at this property in early November for 3 days as part of our vacation at Bali. The property is bang on the Sanur beach. The rooms were clean and spacious. The property has two large swimming pools and couple of speciality restaurants. The breakfast spread was too good and very yummy. The evening band plays good numbers and makes your evening pleasant... The shacks on Sanur beach are at a walking distance from the property... Overall fantastic experience of the stay here.

Second time staying in Prama Sanur. Room is clean, old but well maintained. Breakfast is nice. There's live music every night. Relaxing and calming for working at hotel or vacation.

Fantastic hotel resort in Denpasar/Sanur! This is a great place to stay directly located at the beach. You will find two big pools, several restaurants, bars, a gym, bike rental and much more to relax and recover. The rooms are spacious and come with a balcony or terrace. The breakfast offers a wide range of all different and tasty food. The service is outstanding, very friendly and attentive. Every evening there is some entertainment offered, either in the resort or on a stage at the beach. From Sanur you can reach Ubud in approx. 45 min. or catch a boat to go easily to the islands East bound e.g. Nusa Penida. We enjoyed it very much staying there.

Hotel ini menawarkan berbagai fasilitas yang sangat memadai, Kolam renangnya besar dan bersih, cocok untuk bersantai. Ada juga pusat kebugaran yang lengkap dan spa yang menawarkan berbagai layanan relaksasi. Restoran di hotel menyajikan berbagai menu yang lezat dengan pilihan lokal dan internasional.

Nyaman untuk liburan dan bekerja, staff yang ramah, fasilitas lengkap, koneksi wifi cepat Sarapan tersedia lengkap, room service cepat, restaurant juga nyaman, Spot terbaik ada di bamboo bar, khususnya saat sore menjelang malam Terima Kasih Prama Sanur Beach i'll be back soon

A pleasant hotel in Sanur. The location is strategist with lots of cafes near the hotel. The beach view is beautiful. There is a beach club as well as kids' swimming pool. The room is spacious and clean. There are plenty of breakfast choices in the buffet and the taste is OK. Highly recommended if you are visiting Sanur

Sekedar informasi kami pesan 1 kamar dengan membawa 2 anak Kamar: luas Parkiran: luas dan aman Televisi: besar Air mandi: hangat Sarapan: menu beragam, ada makanan pokok+ Snack+ buah+ sereal+ kopi+ teh Wahana agak2: sepeda+ water park+ taman anak+ kolam dewasa (towel sendiri+ buku bacaan), pemandangan langsung pantai (spesial banget) Sirkulasi udara juga sangat bagus karena ada taman di tengah gedung hotel, bonus malam hari ada penampilan band lokal yg menghibur. di dalam kamar ada pemanas air+teh+kopi+sugar+hair dryer Sabun/shampo/sikat gigi disediakan per paket dengan kemasan cantik.

The rooms is pretty clean and comfortable, and the staffs are very helpful and responsive. I also like the location which next to the beach and the restaurants in the hotel provide you with the best foods ,which is all in one place. And if you feel like going out , there are a lot of restaurants and bars around the hotel as well. üòä

Very reasonably priced for a beach front hotel. Very spacious. Full of seniors, less young ppl. Zero night life obviously. by 9pm sanur is dead. I stayed at Prama Sanur Beach Hotel several times and the service was consistently pleasant. Room rate for Superior (I think the smallest room) was reasonable. Huge hotel area with great access to Sanur beach. The hotel is facing east (Sunrise). Hotel look is very classic with Balinese style. The bed was comfortable, thick pillow, and effective air cond to handle Bali heat. Breakfast menu was plenty of choices (Bread, sausages, ham, salad, rice, noodle, eggs, etc.).

This hotel has already left best years behind. In many places it becomes clear that a renovation from the ground up is manageable. Unfortunately, the service has also left the hotel, there is a simple basic mood in the service concept. The hotel is no longer a five star hotel in any respect, nor would I want to classify it as a four star hotel. The reception and the farewell at the front desk left a lot to be desired. chasing a free table in the breakfast area and coffee in the morning was also a challenge. Was here for a few days, unfortunately the breakfast wasn't particularly good, at best average. The environment is excellent, cleaning within walking distance as well as numerous shopping facilities. I recommend you the Baby Monkey as a place to eat. The WiFi in the hotel was good. Unfortunately, the club rooms no longer have their own area for breakfast, which used to be much better.

This place is pretty good for 35 USD per night with buffet breakfast included. I love how kids stay in the kid pool and don't come to the relatively empty adult pool. The beach bar with the swinging bar seats is fun. You can sit in beach chairs right there on the beach or walk down the beach walk to nearby hotels and restaurants. The place is old, but the rooms were not uncomfortable. They were quietly renovating while we were there. The buffet breakfast is huge. The hotel is within walking distance from a lot of great spas and restaurants, including a terrific brewery. The only negative is that it was pretty windy while we were there. This was my favorite place we stayed.
We had a nice stay here, nice pools and good breakfast. Staff was friendly and helpful. Couldn't checkin early. But they would keep our bags until checkin.
Sensational getaway in the quieter part of Bali. Heaps to do Clean , organised and location is excellent

The best hotel in Sanur , we had the Deluxe Seaview room it was amazing . Food was great, entertainment was available if you wanted it. Pools were cleaned and maintained every day. There are lots of beach bars and restaurants you can walk to, alternatively you can go out the front of the hotel and out into the town.

Beautiful resort right on the beach. Gardens & pools lovely. Breakfast had good variety every morning. We've stayed in Legian, Nusa dua & Sanur. For us Sanur is the best. Only downside was the bathroom is very small.

Hotel ini menawarkan fasilitas lengkap yang meliputi kolam renang yang luas, spa yang menenangkan, dan berbagai pilihan restoran dengan menu internasional dan lokal. Staf hotel yang ramah dan profesional selalu siap membantu dengan memastikan setiap tamu merasa dihargai dan dilayani dengan baik.

On the second day of our stay, we encountered an issue with unpleasant odors emanating from the plumbing in our room. While it was quite bothersome, I was able to mitigate the problem by simply closing the drainage, though I understand that this may be inconvenient for other guests. It seems that this is a common issue in the coastal areas of Bali, and considering the age of the hotel, we can sympathize with the problem. After all, we are connoisseurs of old hotels for several personal reasons. Nevertheless, we hope that the management can take measures to rectify this issue, as we would love to return and stay for longer than just two days. On other aspects, in short, all the 5-star reviews from other guests are honest and accurate. The entire staff is highly competent and professional, and the facilities we enjoyed were simply amazing. Spending a full day indulging in any of the hotel's amenities is well worth it. We were even pleasantly surprised by Ms. Ayu Agung, one of the marketing staff, who approached us during a delicious breakfast to offer birthday greetings. These positive experiences were a first for us and we highly recommend this place to others. It's saddening to leave this wonderful place, and we hope to return soon.

Great location. Unfortunately due to the large size the service is not as friendly and as accommodating as we experienced elsewhere. Rooms are a little outdated but comfy enough. Large buffet breakfast. 2 large swimming areas and 1 suitable for kids with water park.
Stayed here for 4 nights. Hotel facility is great, direct access to Sanur beach. Breakfast is nice. Will definitely stay here again

First time visiting Bali and I booked this hotel because of great reviews. I wasn't disappointed at all. We decided to extend our stay to another week. The hotel offers breakfast with a fee which is all worth it. There are lots of restaurants nearby, ATM and money exchange place. There's grocery store, laundromat, souvenir shops, motorcycle rentals which are all within walking distance.

Currently staying here. It's old, it's huge and it's right on the beach. It's also full of kids and local indo's as they get a cheaper rate than the tourists. Breakfast is out of food alot and is complete chaos It's just ok staying here, not a very classy place, in need of a lot of maintenance

I recently had the privilege of spending time at the enchanting Prama Sanur Beach Hotel. Also shooting our tv show in that area. Let me start by saying that the beauty of Prama Sanur Beach Hotel is simply breathtaking. But what truly made my stay special was the people. To Miss Agung Mas and everyone at Prama Sanur Beach Hotel, thank you from the bottom of my heart for creating memories that will stay with me forever.

Excellent location but rooms are dated and many things need fixing when you look closely. Great family hotel with excellent pool with water slides for kids, as well as an adults only pool. Staff are excellent but not knowledgeable... many quite basic questions unanswered. Had a bad checking-in experience and had to wait hours. The area around the hotel along the beach is fantastic... so many great places to eat, so don't feel that you have to dine within the hotel. Not as chaotic as kuta side, not as pricey as nusa dua ... a great middle ground! If this place renovated it would get 5 stars from me, so only 3 for now.
Aircons were a bit loud but other than that exceeded expectations!
Nice spot. Family friendly. Food has been good, drinks have been great. Breakfast buffet is okay, all the usual stuff available and they chance some dishes up each day.

Definitely not a 5 star hotel, so don't come expecting this. Rooms and hotel are very dated but clean. Staff are super helpful and we had a lovely stay, the location can't be beaten, pool facilities are great and the value for money is really good.

Thank you Prama Sanur Beach Hotel staff for your friendliness and kindness.. Great customer service...We will definitely come back again.. So many smiling and happy people working here always greeting us as we walk by. Highly recommend your Hotel to others... Bye for now.. David and Annette.

March 2018 Very nice and pleasant hotel with lovely meals. Located almost by the beach with a large, lovely pool. However, the tide took away some of the charm down on the beach. The best time was still on Gili Air which we were on for 3 days

The entrance is grand and then you go into your room and it's dirty and outdated. Pillows have saliva stains from the thousands of people that previously used them, our fridge was dirty, reception staff were not that welcoming probably because it's such a busy place. The wasps like to eat breakfast with you. The beach is ok, bit dirty with rubbish. üëéüèºWe wouldn't recommendüëéüèº On the up side, close to restaurants and shops.

All facilities are very well kept and maintained. The staff are friendly and very courteous. A must stay place if your in Sanur.

Good value for money hotel with a great beach bar, the Bamboo Bar... Happy hour 2 for 1 from 4 - 6 pm daily is a winner. Great spot right on the beach. I come here often and it's always good value. üëå

Recently went back to stay at the hotel over new year celebration... generally okay...but for supposedly 5 star hotel, a lot can be improved. Stayed in one of those club room, light was so dim....asked for extra lamps, but the request was never addressed. Cleaning can also be improved. Attended their new year celebration reception, but they were confused with seating arrangements, and was slow to take and deliver our orders. Having said these, general stay was okay...staffs were friendly. Also ate in the three restaurants they operate, they are generally fine. The Indonesian one, or Lada , offers good Indonesian and Balinese options. Italian one was also good.

Saya menginap dan menambah extra bed (Rp. 350.000/extrabed). Dibantu staf bernama pak Arya, ternyata kamar saya di upgrade karena menurut dia kamar yg saya pesan terlalu sempit kl ditambah extrabed. + Ada private beach + kolam renang air hangat + semua staff ramah, kecuali staff yg bertugas di pool + sarapan variatif dan sangat lengkap - saya menginap di gedung baru (Room 731) tetapi saya merasa di daerah luar kamar seperti bau pesing ketika melewati daerah tersebut. Tp, bukan masalah penting.

Karyawan ramah, informatif dan sangat membantu. Terrible outdated rooms. I was there 1 night and did not sleep. Airco did not work properly, room was smelling and not clean. Sheets and pillows were not comfortable and damp. Only the restaurant is good. This hotel needs a quick makeover.

first time in a resort, and i LOVED it best thing? BUFFET BREKKIE so much variety and right on the beach! calm place not a crazy amount of tourists, much nicer place to stay than kuta or saminyak while still being close enough to enjoy those places too, rooms cleaned everyday and aircon perfect

It's on the beach. The location and staff are wonderful but the hotel really needs better maintenence and repair. It's quite old, the towels have a damp smell and the marble etc are clearly discoloured. Didn't enjoy the breakfast either, there's flies everywhere and the taste isn't that of 5 star quality. But you get what you paid for, I guess.
Stayed here for a full week. Great location, nice and clean room, tasty dishes, helpful staff, and heavenly beach/pool bar!

Right on the beach with a great beach bar and restaurant. Our least favourite of 4 hotel stays. Staff could be more helpful and hotel, including rooms in desperate need of refurbishment, very dated and tired. As we had to catch a boat early, we asked reception for an early continental breakfast in room. He rudely just uttered room service. Back in the room the phone didn't work and there were no breakfast option on the room service menu. This could be an amazing resort with a bit of upgrading and customer service. The check out staff were much friendlier and helpful.

Kamarnya nggak kedap suara.. jadi suara tetangga tuh kalau berisik kedengaran.. but overall nyaman kok.. Fasilitas lengkap.. ad swimming pool, gym, resto n cafe... mau nyantai di pinggir pantai juga ad sundeck nya..

Hotel with great facilities for family (seaside hotel with 2 pools) connected with approx 5 km jogging track at Sanur beach. The room was rather old but still nice. I guess the air conditioner in my room is not so good. The resto for breakfast was comy but not so many choices there.

Pertamakali menginap di hotel ini. Pelayanan sangat baik, tempat bersih. Ada 2 kolam renang untuk dewasa dan anak-anak. Kamar dengan interior yang baik, tapi langit-langit nya agak pendek. Mungkin karena hotel yang sudah lama berdiri. Pantai sangat dekat dengan kolam renang dan tidak perlu berjalan jauh. Makan pagi nya lumayan beragam, namun lebih ditambah variasi buah dan sayur untuk salad nya
Kamar agak kuno, ada suara seperti jerry mondar mandir di plafon kamar. Agak lembab karena dekat pantai. Pantai bersih dan bisa buat main anak. Kolam anak besar dan seru. Makanan sarapan variatif.

Staff yang ramah dan sangat membantu. Pantai yang rindang. Breakfast agak kurang. Selain kurang variatif kualitasnya juga harus ditingkatkan. Hotel yang sudah cukup tua tetapi masih tetap nyaman dan beberapa hal harus diperbaiki. Sebagai hotel berbintang disarankan untuk meningkatkan fasilitas yang tidak berbayar seperti lapangan tenis dan bersepeda. Kembali menginap lagi di hotel ini, why not?

My stay in Parma Sanur was amazing. The hotel is very beautiful and conveniently located right besides de beach. You feel you are completely isolated from everything and everyone, but when you leave the premises you realize you have a small city centre full of restaurants and stores, which is great. Breakfast is very complete and delicious. I would definitely stay here again.

If you can get it at around 60-65k a night it's not bad. Right on the beach. Decent pool, decent gym. Room is OK. Balcony OK. Big buffet breakfast is very good, probably one of the best breakfasts for hotels in this price range. But, coffee is terrible. Location and loungers right on the beach is what you're paying for.

Hotel yang terletak di area Sanur ini merupakan hotel lama namun terawat dengan apik sehingga nyaman untuk dijadikan akomodasi selama di Bali. Hotel tertata dengan baik dengan fasilitas yang sangat banyak sehingga cocok untuk mereka yang datang bersama keluarga maupun bagi pasangan. Lokasi yang jauh dari hingar bingar namun tetap dapat menikmati hiburan yang disuguhkan pengelola hotel menambah kenyamanan selama tinggal. Rekomen banget

If you get it for cheap like i did it‚Äôs a good deal.The rooms are old but i saw they are being painted and maybe also renovated.Mostly of the staff is friendly,the location is great,the facilities are ok but also need some renovation/work.Breakfast was good

The hotel is somewhat dated and in need of refurbishment. Its certainly not 5 star, and would even push to reach 4 star. Located in a good position on the beach. The buffet breakfast is adequate, the staff are amazing.

Was staying fro 3 nights. The hotel is huge, and the garden is nice and well maintained. It has the access for private beach, but the beach was not clean and very well maintained. Breakfast was so so, and the lady at the first omelette station, the nearest to the buffet station mostly showed me sour face, and much nicer to the foreigners. Room was smelly and not so clean on the first day, fridge and AC also super noisy, because I guess they are quite old already, and the alley was quite creepy at night, since they gave me a room exactly in the end of the alley. The the door access that people passed was exactly in the front of my door, and I can heard it squeaking everytime someone was passing it at anytime. The top of the bed was also dusty, but as I requested they wipe it clean and vacuum it on the 2nd night, and yes, much cleaner on the 3rd night. I can understand that this huge hotel must be struggling during pandemic, yet they need to be well maintained to be in shape. But I feel very uncomfortable with how the staffs treat the local guests, including me. This hotel staffs are mostly not greeting whenever I passed them, not smiling, and also not so friendly to be asked for coffee in breakfast place, or to simply take my things from the concierge. Nobody offers me help with the luggage as well, except the bellboy that was on duty the night I checked in, on 14th of May. Through my stay, I could see the staffs are much friendlier and nicer to the foreigners guests. The lady in the omelette station also gave me sour face on the 1st morning staying there, and rudely told me to queue as if I didn't understand to queue - while I was indeed queueing, but there was no Q sign, so I just stand near the station. And I just left the station afterwards and I didn't take any eggs nor eat from the breakfast place on that day. Luckily for the next day I had breakfast meeting in other real 5 stars hotel that was much nicer. If you are having vacation as a family, and foreigners, this might be a good deal place to stay. But if you are on solo trip, not really on holiday, and local tourist, not really recommended.

Ask for new room because it was very dirty. Second room also was very dirty. Had them change the beds 3 times both of beds. Still you find large pee stain and yellow pillows that werent washed for years. All other hotels I was in Bali were much better. While talking respectively and with patience to the hotel manager I was being interrupted over 7 times. He was not listening nor caring. We were with group of TUI and all people were not happy with their room. They even offered a deep cleaning servers of the room. To even having to offer this is very questionable in a 4 star hotel. They did not offer refund nor any alternative solution. So we had to book another hotel.

What a great hotel for families. It is ideal for kids with a large kiddie pool and extensive seating for Mom and Dad. The pool has a huge play area for the kids and the beach is shallow way out. Kids can use small pedal carts and the staff really looks out for the little ones when the parents aren't paying attention. Great buffet breakfast and there is a gym and adult pool. The hotel was showing it's age and could use a facelift vs the repair jobs. The drinks were very weak...like I noted this was more of a family resort not for couples although still nice enough. Sanur Beach was pleasant and there was an abundance of shops nearby. A Seaview room is the way to go. They had a pool party on Sunday and Brazilian Barbeque on Saturday, both with live entertainment.

We stayed for one night at the Prama Sanur Beach Hotel. Breakfast was excellent, amazing pool and great location with a lovely beach.Friendly staff allowed us to stay at the pool after check out. We had to wait for our room to be ready when checking in and the room was a little dated. We will be back for sure.

My husband and I stayed 30th July for 9 nights. I am disabled now but have stayed 3 times before when I could walk so I was nervous how we would cope. The experience was first class from Simon and his team around the pool who went to great lengths for my comfort and help me getting in the pool. All staff from room boys to room service, reception, hotel car driver are outstanding. Perfect location near supermarket also 7km level path for my mobility scooter so we could visit other cafes,bars etc. The disabled room we had was ok,although we had to hire a shower bench and over toilet seat. Stepping into the shower was difficult, maybe if this step was removed it would be much easier for disabled people. We will definitely return üòä

First impressions were that the staff had no interest at Check-in which is very unusual for us as we have never experienced this over the 25 years we have been coming to Bali. Staff were more disengaged than we have ever seen (a few were great tho). Cleanliness was another surprise. Our Toilet still had splatters in the bowl so was obviously not cleaned properly from last occupants. I am surprised at the great reviews this hotel is getting. We have been travelling all over the island over the past 3 weeks and staying at varying accommodation. Unfortunately, this was the worst and we won‚Äôt be back. I don't know if it's because of the renovations or because of the Corona, but for the price I have nothing to say. I would be happy to stay here again for this priceü§û

This is an older style hotel that opens up to sanur beach itself. The rooms were well appointed and tastefully designed. I loved the bathroom implements. The breakfast spread was a bit underwhelming for domestic tourists, while for westerners, all the main staples were there, such as delicious coffee, fluffy omelette, various healthy foods, and run of the mill Balinese cuisines.

I‚Äôm not kidding when I say that everyone is so very nice, helpful, and kind. This hotel is an oldie, BUT their room facilities were still good. Since it‚Äôs located in the rather south side (if I‚Äôm not mistaken), you can easily take a walk along the Sanur coast and enjoy the sunrise!!! There are a lot of good and amazing restaurants and bars nearby!!!

This affordable five-star hotel is conveniently situated next to Sanur Beach. One of the highlights for me was being able to enjoy breakfast right by the beach, followed by snorkeling to discover a variety of small fish, starfish, and crabs. To top off the morning, you can take a refreshing swim in the superb pool located next to the restaurant. The hotel is also surrounded by fantastic shops and restaurants, offering a complete experience for lunch, dinner, and souvenir shopping. I highly recommend staying at this hotel when you visit the Sanur Beach area.

I always stay here whenever I have vacation in Bali. It has all the complete facilities and rather a quiet place to stay while within walking distance you can have a look around and shop. It has a private beach so you dont have to go far to enjoy the scenery.

Nginep disini 2 hari. Honest review harganya affordable sih untuk fasilitas dan pelayanan nya. Lebih murah via online saya pesennya. Nice location near the beach but hotel is quiet old, small room with balcony. The price is ok for stay one night before the flight. Quick check out. Only few problems: the floor just new painting so have strong smell, a small dirty in blanket, chiller no work.

Ini pengalaman pertama disini. Lingkungannya enak. Fasilitas oke, kolam renang banyak dengan fasiltas bermain anak. Di bagian belakang, bisa jalan¬≤ atau naik sepeda (skating juga bisa) dengan jalur terpisah antara sepeda dan pejalan kaki. Pantai banyak tempat berjemur khususnya wisman.

Rooms need to be updated, old style rooms like most older hotels at the beachside. What disappointed me most was the many hairs I found in the bathroom and that's something I hate. Staff excellent, breakfast great üëç

Great value rooms and the pools are excellent. Kids pool has plenty of room and the main pool is just enormous, like swimming in a lake! Hotel bintang 5 yang sudah lama berdiri jadi meubelnya sudah kuno.. untuk rate nya masih terjangkau

Rooms were OK (slightly tired but still good, 3 pools for the kids were amazing, all personal is very positive and great, food was delicious, breakfast was as well great with fresh juices and great food variety, good cocktails. Coffee can be improved during breakfast, at least for European taste it can be stronger. Seaside was great and shallow, great for kids and relax, we liked everything.

Hotelnya punya akses ke pantai, ada kolam renang khusus anak juga, santai di pantainya sore sangat menyenangkan sambil pesan makan dan minum. Hotelnya tenang, tiap malam minggu ada musik didekat pantai. Staffnya ramah, makan enak.

The resort was great along the beach with great swimming pools(kids pool was actually amazing with water slides). But the rooms were very compact. The bathroom was not upto the mark for a 5-star resort. Could have been better
Room I stayed in was run down, stained, broken components, and moldy, especially near the AC unit. Staff was fairly helpful. Very nice location, both in front of hotel and on the beach

The staff hotel was friendly and the lobby looks vintage with brown colour domination. There's Sanur beach direct behind the hotel and shuttle to Hardy's (supermarket, souvenirs & street cafes). Superior room quite small, just enough only 3 adult & deluxe bigger. All room has balcony & make sure to request the sea view or garden not parking view. Breakfast was excellent for me. Many kinds and taste good. No regrets in this hotel

A good friend of mine treated me a swim package at Prama. It has a kid pool and 1 big main pool. We really enjoyed the main one with nice and clean water. Not to mention the friendly waiter who made us feel at ease. Outdoor shower and changing rooms are available. If you live around Denpasar and love swimming, you should give it a try.

Prior to Covid this hotel was excellent. Unfortunately they have spent no money on refurbishment and it looks very tired in places. That said , it is still in a beautiful location and has one of the nicest pools I have seen anywhere. Hopefully the management will see what a gem they have here and invest some much needed love into the old girl.

The hotel is very old and they need to replace the carpet and refurbish the rooms. The bathroom was pretty poor in that there was no bum gun/bidet function, which is obligatory in Indonesia, and the toilet paper was difficult to reach. Many of the electric sockets in the room did not work. It was a bad choice for us as the breakfast (ok only, not great), is not of interest, and the only reason you would stay here given the old, poor, small rooms, is the beach access and pool areas. We should have stayed elsewhere as we did not use or have any interest in these. If you want these facilities, you can stay here, but for us this was a bad choice, and we moved to another hotel for half the price with more modern rooms

We loved the pool and the beach area! The water slides are a little well used but our kids (6, 8, 10) had a fun day. The beach area had plenty of seating and easy to order food or drinks, well servicesf by the nearby bar/restaurant.
The location is superb. They have may longchair that can help you to enjoy the beach peacefully. They have swimming pool for kids. Suitable for family vacatiob.

They were running a special, basic rooms going for $65 AUD. We booked one of the good rooms deluxe garden access I think it is called for $110. If you are on the budget, this is a good hotel. It has everything beach front, excellent kids pool with slides and shade, many seating areas and chaise lounge. Everything is accessible within walking distance. Overall, this has been a good stay. The deluxe garden room is spacious, has a couch that folds into a bed, great for kids. Now the issues: This is not a 5 star hotel. Expect more like 4 stars. Cleanliness and amenities are not up to 5 stars standard. Breakfast choices are poor...and you would expect to line up for at least 10 mins at the egg station. We asked the waiter for fresh juice and cappuccino only to be surprised that we were billed for that. These were inclusive in all 5 stars resorts we stayed in so far in Bali. Other little annoying things: got a cocktail during happy hour buy 1 get 1 free. Then got billed for two. When I asked why, the answer was because you shared the drink with your wife, you are not allowed to share. I was laughing! And pool close too ealry by 7. Overall, if this is on special it is value for money. Just don't expect 5 stars.

I loved the stay! The hotel is clean, very well kept, and has so many spots to take pictures. Besides that, the staff is also very nice. Smiles are always on their faces and I have nothing short of the best to say about them. The view is also amazing as there is a beach right behind the hotel. I organized a conference (before covid-19) here and to no surprise everybody that attended loved their stay just as much as I did. If you are bringing kids, dont worry! There is a pool here that your kids would love because it has a slide that can keep them entertained. If you love dogs, you would also love it here because there are many cute dogs roaming around the beach near the hotel! In conclusion, staying here is an amazing choice that I made and I will definitely recommend it to those who want to go to Bali.

Hotel asyik untuk liburan keluarga. Kolamnya ada 2 lokasi, 1 untuk dewasa(cukup dalam) dan 1 untuk anak2: Mulai dari kolam dengan air semata kaki org dewasa, 30 cm dan 1,5 m. Juga ada perosotan.. Hotel ini juga memiliki pantai sendiri akses langsung dr hotel.

Hotel lama yg masih bagus dan well maintained dgn harga yg affordable. Tapi bbpp bagian hotel butuh renovasi dan penyegaran, spt outdorr area dan poolnya. Tamu2 rata dr eropa yg mencari ketenangan, krn daerah sanur lebih tenang dan sepi dibanding kuta, seminyak, dll Breakfast was so-so.

Lingkungan yang bersih sangat bersih dan suasana yang tenang serta rimbun saat pertama kali masuk membuat saya merasa lebih baik, pelayanan yg baik serta kamar yang bagus menjadi pengalamn terbaik saat menginap di hotel ini

Prama Sanur Beach Bali offers a sublime retreat that seamlessly blends modern luxury with authentic Balinese charm. From the moment you arrive, you're greeted by warm hospitality and breathtaking views of the ocean. The resort's lush gardens and traditional architecture create an atmosphere of tranquility and serenity. The spacious and elegantly appointed rooms provide a comfortable sanctuary, with all the amenities needed for a relaxing stay. From delectable local dishes to international cuisine, every meal is a culinary delight. The resort's restaurants and bars offer a variety of dining options, from casual beachside fare to fine dining experiences. Beyond the amenities, what truly sets Prama Sanur Beach Bali apart is its exceptional service. The staff goes above and beyond to ensure every guest's needs are met with genuine care and attention to detail. Overall, Prama Sanur Beach Bali is more than just a resort‚Äîit's a haven where luxury meets authenticity, making it the perfect destination for an unforgettable getaway.

Very nice and luxury hotel. Situaed strategically in Sanur area. It is closed to the airport, Denpasar and also to most tourist attraction on South Bali. Hotel staff are nice, friendly and helpful. Kamar sangat nyaman, kolam renang juga tersedia, bisa langsung main ke pantai, dapat breakfast. Untuk cermin saya tidak tahu apakah semua kamar sama, tapi kalo bisa jangan dihadapkan langsung ke depan pintu masuk karena bikin kaget.

3 tahun lalu pernah menginap hampir 1 minggu di tempat ini, pelayanannya cukup bagus, kamar bersih, kolam renang luas sekali, menu makanan di restoran beraneka ragam, ada makanan nasional maupun western, tapi yang selalu terngiang saat makan omlet dan kentang, luar biasa enaknya..... Hotel tua namun terawat. Sarapan oke banget, lokasi langsung pantai. Staff dan security ramah, hanya kolam renang perlu peremajaan.

I really enjoy staying at the Prama Sanur Beach Hotel with my family. My kids who are 5 and & 7 always have a great time at the Kids Club and the Splash Zone (kids pool). And the staff here are all excellent, especially Anna, the Front Office Manager, who has always made our stays at the hotel amazing. We have stayed here twice and really like the hotel facilities and the location and hope to visit again next time we are in Bali.

Kami datang 27-10-2023 ke resepsionist hotel ini untuk lakukan telepon ke inggris UK , untuk telepon Bank di UK, kami datang ke hotel ini karena hotel local ternama & untuk menambah bisnis juga karena kan kami tentunya akan bayar biaya telepon serta administration nya serta kami butuh invoice tertulis untuk telepon international tapi amat di sayangkan pihak resepsionist bilangtidak bisa, hanya bisa untuk tamu yang menginap di hotel tersebut. A bit disappointing. Got room card mixed up when checking in and we entered an occupied room. Didn't get clean towel in the next day and they left 1 used towel. They started renovating the rooms but service and other facilities needed to be improved as well.

Harga dan fasilitas sangat bagus. Tidak perlu keluar hotel tp sudah dapat semua fasilitas seperti reato, bar, pantai, kolam renang, jogging trek, view. Sarapannya juga enak enak. Pelayananny sangat ramah, tidak membedakan turis lokal dan turis asing.

Breakfast really good, staff super nice, nice and comfortable rooms, beautiful beach and plenty of sunbeds for everyone (when I say beautiful beach I mean it as per Bali standards). It is a big complex, if you are looking for a cozy place, this is not for you. It is extremely cold in the lobby, have a spare jacket or sweather when you come to check in :) Bamboo beach bar is also very comfortable, nice pizza and not extremely expensive. As a comparison pizza margarita is 60k. They say they have a good spa, however it is really expensive, more than 600k, while other nice spas offer the same for 300k and on the street you can do it for 100k.

Hotelnya besar dan luas. Bangunan lama tapi terawat dan bersih. Tamannya bagus, ada kolam renang, gym, spa, sepeda, restaurant tepi pantai, akses langsung ke pantai, parkir luas, ada ruang sidang, wifi gratis, tempat pentas seni, joging, kamar bersih, makanan enak. Pelayanan baik, harga/tarif bersahabat.

Asik bgt tempatnya, suasana sejuk, airnya bagus lancar, banyak pepohonan jadi rindang, fasilitas nya lengkap, resto nya sih yang asik bisa dinner dan breakfast menghadap langsung ke laut karena memang di pantai hehehe, ballroom wantilan nya keren cocok buat wedding dan acara indoor lainnya, menu breakfast sama dinnernya juga enak, masakan khas balinya berasa bgt Cocok lah buat staycation disini

+ Very nice, welcoming and friendly staff. Beautiful setting. Many restaurants to choose from. Nice pools. Family friendly. The room was big enough and clean. - They kept us waiting for 1 hour and 15 minutes in the lobby because there had been some problem with our room and we couldn't check in. The shuttle service is over by 5 pm, so you are forced to get taxis or walk around 30 minutes. The wifi is TERRIBLE. The hotel offers many shows and activities, but at a high price. We wanted to see the Legong Dance but you can only see it while having dinner in one of their restaurants. They told us the price of the dinner (buffet) but forgot to mention this was without drinks, taxes or the 7% tip. Wouldn't recommend it to couples without kids, or friends visiting the island, as this is a family oriented resort.

Nice beach front hotel. Rooms are newly renovated but its age still show. It's near the warungs and spas. It's a bit of a walk from the hotel lobby to the main street, but it's very manageable. Pools and beach are well maintained. The staff are very friendly.
Every time I go to the Sanur, I‚Äùll choose to stay here. The atmosphere of the hotel is quiet, the pedestrian space is wide, the beach is clean, the swimming pool is very wide. Very good breakfast.

We go to basilico often for breakfast. It's a nice and quiet, clean place to sit down and enjoy your breakfast. Our dog love it there, beach is always cleaned and during the pandemic the menue is really nice and not overpriced at all. Service is good, friendly and helpful. We stayed 8 nights in Prama in December 2022. We loved our stay and can highly recommend it. Prama has done a great job in the last months and the hotel looked in my opinion again like it was before the pandemic. Great facilities and the service level is amazing. We felt like home at Prama.

Fine hotel with nice roomes og a super pool area. The breakfast was good there was a lot different food to chose from. The service was fine and they are very helpful. The hotel's prime location and captivating beauty are undeniable, although it would benefit from an upgrade, as the rooms appear tired. Recognizing the challenges Bali faced during Covid, I'm understanding, yet recommend considering renovations in the next couple of years. However, the standout feature of the hotel is its remarkable staff, who are consistently friendly and helpful across all departments. From reception to housekeeping, and from breakfast to pool services, everyone exudes a willingness to assist with a smile. My only minor inconvenience was the room's electrical setup, where turning off the lights also shuts off the TV, hindering bedtime viewing. Additionally, the ongoing issue of guests reserving pool beds with towels and then disappearing for the day is frustrating and affects others' enjoyment of the pool area. Despite these minor grievances, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and look forward to returning, eagerly recommending your hotel to our friends in Australia.
